Name: Connect-WSMan
Synopsis: Connects to the WinRM service on a remote computer.

Name: Disable-WSManCredSSP
Synopsis: Disables CredSSP authentication on a computer.

Name: Disconnect-WSMan
Synopsis: Disconnects the client from the WinRM service on a remote computer.

Name: Enable-WSManCredSSP
Synopsis: Enables Credential Security Support Provider (CredSSP) authentication on a computer.

Name: Get-WSManCredSSP
Synopsis: Gets the Credential Security Support Provider-related configuration for the client.

Name: Get-WSManInstance
Synopsis: Displays management information for a resource instance specified by a Resource URI.

Name: Invoke-WSManAction
Synopsis: Invokes an action on the object that is specified by the Resource URI and by the selectors.

Name: New-WSManInstance
Synopsis: Creates a new instance of a management resource.

Name: New-WSManSessionOption
Synopsis: Creates session option hash table to use as input parameters for WS-Management cmdlets.

Name: Set-WSManInstance
Synopsis: Modifies the management information that is related to a resource.

Name: Set-WSManQuickConfig
Synopsis: Configures the local computer for remote management.

Name: Test-WSMan
Synopsis: Tests whether the WinRM service is running on a local or remote computer.
